title: The tragical end and death of the Lord Iames Regent of Scotland, lately set forth in Scottish, and printed at Edinburgh. 1570. And now partly turned in to English
author: Sempill, Robert, 1530?-1595.
publisher: By Iohn Awdely, dwelling in litle Britaine strete, without Aldersgate,
notes: Verse - "Iames Earle of Murray Regent of renowne".
Originally published the same year in Edinburgh as: The regentis tragedie.
"The tragedies lenuoy" is in a single column at right.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
